channel.title: Chilling during king selection
channel.description: Its safe to say that drunk hard counters reaper. If ur reaper and ur debauched by a drunk, you're guaranteed to lose even if he dies because of log. At least chilling delays ur loss. However, you arent given the option to chill if the king dies and people (namely the drunk) step up to prove royal blood and subsequently out you. I think you should be allowed to chill during king selection so you have a chance to not instantly get executed the day after u get debauched.

item.title: Chilling during king selection
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
You will still lose anyways as you can’t empower reap/chill at the same time so the drunk can keep debbing/happy hour you until you run out of souls. The only alternative scenario is that drunk gets killed through the court or the unseen/cult, but that seems unlikely and the logs would still out you. If they’d be converted, they’d likely still deb/occupy you too.

Regardless I do support this change, because it makes chill uesable for framing royals, which is especially good versus drunks, which can completely destroy your game as mentioned before. I just didn’t agree with the scenario you postulated that highlights why this change should be made.
